description: Monitoring dashboard for roachprod-centralized task service metrics, API performance, and system resources

panels.description: Worker pool utilization percentage per instance
panels.title: Worker Pool Utilization

panels.description: Active workers vs maximum configured workers per instance
panels.title: Worker Capacity

panels.description: Time taken to process tasks from start to completion, grouped by task type and percentile
panels.title: Task Processing Duration

panels.description: Time tasks spend in pending state before processing starts
panels.title: Task Queue Age

panels.description: Rate of task timeouts by type
panels.title: Task Timeouts

panels.description: Number of workers currently processing tasks per instance
panels.title: Active Workers by Instance

panels.description: HTTP request rate grouped by endpoint
panels.title: API Request Rate

panels.description: HTTP request latency percentiles by endpoint
panels.title: API Request Duration

panels.description: Fraction of CPU time spent in garbage collection
panels.title: GC CPU Fraction

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors. Monitor for leaks from CLI processes (gcloud, aws, etc.)
panels.title: Open File Descriptors

panels.description: Resident memory (RSS) - actual memory used by process. Container has 2GB limit.
panels.title: Resident Memory (RSS)

panels.description: GC pause duration by quantile. Spikes indicate GC pressure that could timeout health checks.
panels.title: GC Pause Duration (by quantile)

panels.description: Current number of open database connections
panels.title: Open Connections

panels.description: Rate of queries waiting for available connections
panels.title: Connection Waits

panels.description: Connection pool health over time - in use vs idle connections
panels.title: Connection Pool Health

panels.description: Average time queries wait for an available connection
panels.title: Average Connection Wait Duration

panels.description: Authentication attempts by method and result
panels.title: Authentication by Method

panels.description: Current valid tokens in the system
panels.title: Active Tokens

panels.description: Users attempting to authenticate without SCIM provisioning
panels.title: Unprovisioned (1h)

panels.description: Percentage of authorization decisions that allow access
panels.title: Authz Allow Rate

panels.description: SCIM operations per second by type
panels.title: SCIM Request Rate

panels.description: Current number of enabled service accounts
panels.title: Service Accounts

panels.description: Token distribution by type and status
panels.title: Token Distribution

title: roachprod-centralized - Monitoring Dashboard
